job_description: I am responsible for creating, maintaining, and modifying web applications, from database creation to style editing.

quotes.quote: Every now and then, a new technology, an old problem, and a big idea turn into an innovation.
Great opportunities arise from having known how to make the most of the small ones.
The world can be changed in 140 characters.
The real danger is not that computers would start to think like men, but that men would start to think like computers.

about_me_paragraphs: My name is Brian Sanchez Aguilar, and I am an engineer in information and communication technologies.
I have been working as a developer for over a year.
learning different languages and traveling to different countries.
how_to_help_paragraph: I can help you design websites and develop their functionalities using programming languages and specialized software.
